title: Redefinition of hyphenation patterns in LaTeX
content: How do I redefine hyphenation rules for a given language? (First: where is the file for, say, German?) The change I want to make is simple: I want to allow the replacement of "ſ" (long s) for "s", without that affecting the rules. Is this possible, and as easy as I imagine it should be?
author: Laurentius
